usage_guidelines.customization: Always adapt templates to your brand voice and specific context
usage_guidelines.testing: A/B test different variations to optimize performance
usage_guidelines.analytics: Track which templates perform best for your audience
usage_guidelines.iteration: Update templates based on performance data

platform_specific_notes.instagram: Focus on saves (5x algorithm weight) and visual storytelling
platform_specific_notes.twitter: Be concise, use threads for depth, engage quickly
platform_specific_notes.linkedin: Lead with business value, professional tone, data-driven
platform_specific_notes.tiktok: Trending sounds crucial, hook in 3 seconds, captions required
platform_specific_notes.facebook: Native video preferred, community-focused, longer content OK
platform_specific_notes.pinterest: SEO keywords essential, evergreen content, vertical images
